episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_010:
Uncle Wall! I heard that you’ll be hosting a
New Year’s event!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_020:
So, you’re hosting a magnificent event to celebrate
the upcoming year...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_030: I can’t wait to see what you’ve got planned!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_040: If it’s an event Uncle Wall is organizing...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_050: it’s bound to be wonderful, elegant, AND glorious!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_080:
I’ll make sure it’s fun for everyone. I hope you
look forward to it!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_090: There’s just...one thing I can’t figure out.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_100:
But once I do, the day should be wonderful and
perfect!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_110: Are you talking about your partner Pokémon?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_130:
Oh, are you having problems dealing with your
new partner?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_140:
Not at all! Blacephalon is a wonderful partner
Pokémon!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_150:
What’s actually on my mind is something Sabrina
told me.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_160:
She said she had a premonition that something
“large, white, and long” would lead to my success.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4001_1001_170: What could my key to success be?
episode_event_newyear_2024/6801_1031_010:
May we begin this new
year with elegance!
episode_event_newyear_2024/6801_1001_010:
Hmm, what would be the perfect highlight for a
New Year’s event...?
episode_event_newyear_2024/6801_1001_030:
Would you like Drampa and me to perform an
astounding dance?
episode_event_newyear_2024/6801_1001_040: That’s a nice idea! Everyone would enjoy that!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_020:
Exactly! I’d like you to challenge a mountain
this time!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_040: Well, the hint is a water Pokémon I love!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_050:
A Magikarp living for many years can leap
a mountain using Splash...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_060:
It’s a message from Pokémon! Traveling long roads
on foot will lead to success!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_080:
and climb a mountain to see the first sunrise of
the year, in hopes that each of our New Year’s
resolutions will come true!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_090: So, in the spirit of supporting this endeavor...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_100:
Blacephalon and I have prepared a fireworks
display as a glorious treat!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_110:
Please enjoy it along with the marvelous scenery
from the top of the mountain!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_140: Let’s do our best to climb to the top!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_150: You’re quite fond of children, aren’t you?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_160: Oh? That’s a rare Pokémon you’ve got there, Clair.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_170: Is she your new partner Pokémon?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_180:
Yes. Don’t you think she’s the perfect dragon
Pokémon for me?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_190: Well, we’re not officially partners yet, though.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_210:
I found her a couple of days ago playing with
some children.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_220:
I thought it was strange because I couldn’t see
her Trainer. So I looked around but couldn’t find
anyone...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_230: In the end, I decided to take care of her myself.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_240: Oh, so you helped a Pokémon that was in trouble!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_250: That’s excellent. You’ve certainly grown, Clair.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_270:
Watch me! I’ll succeed in climbing the mountain for
New Year’s!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_280:
And I’ll gain the approval of my master in
Blackthorn City...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_290:
by becoming a Gym Leader with impeccable skill
and spirit!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_300: With my pride on the line, I won’t lose!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_310:
I-I don’t think there’s any winning or losing in
climbing a mountain...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4002_1001_320:
I reckon it’ll take more time until our master
accepts her...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_010:
Here’s where the fireworks will be launched. This
way, we won’t have to worry about any fire
spreading!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_020: Now then, can you help me prepare?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_040: Blacephalon seems happy that you’re here.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_050:
You totally get how Blacephalon feels, don’t you,
Uncle Wall?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_060:
You’re a Water-type user, so I was surprised
when I heard you became a sync pair with
Blacephalon...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_080: Hmm... Well, I suppose I should explain.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_090: It all happened the other day...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_100:
This Pokémon... It’s one of those Ultra Beasts I’ve
been hearing about...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_110: Return to the world you came from, you—
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_130:
I didn’t just feel the enormous impact of your
explosion—I also sensed the beauty of it!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_140:
What a glorious performance! I’d even call it the
artistry of flames!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_150:
If that’s the case, allow me to show you the
artistry of water!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_180:
I suppose you understand that there’s no need for
us to fight.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_190:
Oh! You need to go back now, or the Ultra
Wormhole will—
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_200: Oh no! How could this happen?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_210:
We both came to a mutual understanding as
fellow entertainers, but Blacephalon lost its way
back home...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_230:
Blacephalon wants to display more of its flame
artistry, and I’d like to help it!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_240:
I’ve been called an artist and lover of water. If
we combine that with Blacephalon’s flames...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_250:
I think we’d be able to put on an exceptional
performance!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_260:
So THAT’S why you two became a sync pair!
How wonderful!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_320:
Did you figure out what Sabrina meant by that
“large, white, and long” thing she told you about?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4003_1001_330: Hmm... Actually, I have no idea what it could be.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_010: Oh? Have you finished preparing the fireworks?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_020: Yep! Uncle Wall and Blacephalon are ready!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_030: This Pokémon came to play with us earlier, too!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_040: Do you wanna be friends with us?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_060:
That Drampa must really like being
around children...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_070:
And it looks like she’s been protecting the children
from the dangers of the mountain.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_100:
I know you want to play games with children, but
we need to get going...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_120: You can’t let a Pokémon control you like that...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4004_1001_130: That’s why dragon masters aren’t beautiful!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_010: Excuse me?! Who the heck are you?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_020:
I’m Katherine! A Gym Trainer in Laverre City—and
a furisode girl, too!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_030:
Which means I’m not only a disciple of Valerie—
the world-renowned clothing designer...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_040: but I’m also an amazing Fairy-type user!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_060:
What opponents are fairies good against? I think
you know the answer...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_070:
Dragon Pokémon are no match for beautiful and
cute fairy Pokémon!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_090:
I won’t allow you to talk bad about us dragon
masters or dragon Pokémon!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_100:
As the Gym Leader of Blackthorn City, I won’t lose
to you!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_120:
Well, at least you’re a worthy opponent! OK then,
let’s battle!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_140: Hahaha! Seems like things are sparking up!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4005_1001_150:
They’re both doing what they want to do,
I suppose...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_030:
Look at the time! This is all your fault—you picked
a fight with me!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_040:
Now I won’t be able to reach the top of the
mountain by sunrise because of you!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_070: Ugh?! It’s the smell of rain...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_080: What?! Is it going to rain?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_090: That means the event might get canceled!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_120:
Whether we battle here or keep climbing the
mountain, the result is the same...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_130:
We won’t make it to the top of the mountain...and
we won’t see the sunrise or fireworks...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_140: What a horrible way to start the new year...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_160: Don’t whine like that—you’re being pathetic.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_180: I won’t let the rain ruin my future!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_190: Or anyone else’s, for that matter!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_200:
Everyone is looking forward to the sunrise and
fireworks—especially the children!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_220: If we adults gave up, what would they think?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_230:
Those kids have a longer future ahead of them—
and far more potential!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_240: I won’t ever give up! There must be a way...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_260: Drampa! Can you fly to Wallace and Blacephalon?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4006_1001_300:
You go ahead and tell everyone to wait a
little longer!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4007_1001_010: Unfortunately, we’ll need to cancel the event...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4007_1001_030: *pant* *pant* It’s too early to make that decision!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4007_1001_040:
If we have Blacephalon ride Drampa, they could
cause an explosion to clear the rain clouds!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4007_1001_060:
Wonderful! That’s an elegant plan—
infuriatingly so!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_020: Can’t we see the sunrise or the fireworks?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_050: The rain clouds are getting bigger...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_060:
Yeah, we should probably start climbing down the
mountain before it gets worse...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_090: Someone’s coming to change the dark future...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_110:
The rain will stop! I think...? So, um, please don’t
leave just yet!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_120: Huh? What do you mean by that?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_150: Hey, look! It’s Blacephalon and Drampa!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4008_1001_160: Wow! The clouds are getting smaller!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_010:
Did you enjoy the artistry of flames decorating
the sky?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_040:
So, you were able to launch all the fireworks
we prepared!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_050: All thanks to Drampa and Blacephalon.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_060:
The two of them using their moves together
cleared the skies...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_070:
and we were able to perform the finale of
the event!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_080:
I’m glad that you were able to protect the
children’s smiles.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_090:
I never expected the large, white, and long
something that Sabrina told me about to mean
Drampa!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_100:
I suppose you deserve to be called a
dragon master...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_110: I didn’t think you’d actually beat the rain clouds.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_130:
I’m surprised you were able to reach the top of
the mountain in such a short time. I’ve changed my
mind about you—only slightly, though.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_160: Just like a Magikarp that leaps over a mountain...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_190:
In the end, you got to the top of the mountain
by riding Drampa, didn’t you?
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_200:
So, I’m better than you because I didn’t cheat—I
climbed the mountain with my own feet!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_220: Who do you think made the event a success?!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_240:
Ugh! It was stupid of me to give you ANY credit
for this!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_250: Let’s settle once and for all who’s better!
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_260: You’re on! I’ll never EVER lose to a dragon master.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_280: *sigh* They’ve still got a lot to learn...
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_290:
They’re both similar to each other. Maybe neither
one of them wants to give in.
episode_event_newyear_2024/4009_1001_300: But such relationships can also shine beautifully...
